attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The new facelifted Honda Amaze. The All New Honda Amaze Comfort model features a new 7''touchscreen infotainment system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. For added convenience the new infotainment system incorporates a reverse parking camera on the comfort model, while rear park distance control is now a standard feature. Upgraded new interior to black. A brand new front grille, new 15" diamond-cut alloy wheels and LED Front Fog Lights. Legendary fuel efficiency on the renowned 1.2 liter engine. Come see for yourself the great build quality and reliability.
This vehicle includes a factory warranty of 5 year / 200000km, 2 year /30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance. Book your test drive today!

Finance available to all approved buyers, Trade in's Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The Perfect FIT For Your Lifestyle
The all-new Honda Fit offers outstanding efficiency, comfort and class-leading specifications.
The design is new, the infotainment system is up to date, there are plenty of places to charge things and the screens are high-resolution. The powertrain is on point too; those who are particularly concerned with fuel economy will appreciate the Fit’s light consumption figures. Class-leading is the best way to describe the cabin space in the Fit. It’s very comfortable inside and passenger space is certainly at the top of the hatchback segment.

This vehicle comes with standard 5 Year/200,000km Warranty, 4 Year/60,000km service plan & 3 Years AA Roadside Assist.

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
